Functions related to output.

Low level functions

These are various utility functions that are normally only called by advanced users.

SymPy

These are functions to interact with SymPy, including installation and getting SymPy version.

Complete reference

dlmFilter2()

Filter a dlm

dlmXFilter()

Filter a dlm

dlmXMLE()

Fit dlm with MLE

dlmXOpt()

Fit model by minimizing RSS + pen * length of fitted curve.

getFF() getGG() getVV() getWW()

Extractor for dlm objects

mm() aa() CC() RR()

Extractor for dlmFiltered objects

dlmXForecast()
